segments.text: I notice the boy climbing on that stool, and I can’t help but smile at his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s really going for those cookies, even if it’s risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, her hand outstretched like she’s waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they make a good team, even if they’re breaking the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice the water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how oblivious she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on those cookies that he doesn’t even realize how close he is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets what he wants without hurting himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just so ridiculous and funny.
segments.speaker: PAR
